casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

July, 1990

(July 13, 1990) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Walter Scott, Appellant.

Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s application to withdraw granted (see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from judgment of Ontario County Court, Henry, Jr., J.—criminal sale of controlled substance, fourth degree.) Present—Dillon, P. J., Green, Lawton, Davis and Lowery, JJ.
